name: com.gamelovers.uiservice
author: Miguel Tomas
description:
This package provides a service to help manage an Unity's, game UI.
It allows to open, close, load, unload and request any Ui Configured in the game.
The package provides a Ui Set that allows to group a set of Ui Presenters to help load, open and close multiple Uis at the same time.

To help configure the game's UI you need to create a UiConfigs Scriptable object by:
- Right Click on the Project View > Create > ScriptableObjects > Configs > UiConfigs
